it.polimi.ingsw.lim.controller

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.controller.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMIUser, SocketUser

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Created by Davide on 26/05/2017. This class represent the person playing the game. It has a unique username picked from the db upon login. It has also a reference to the corresponding client. It will be used as a gateway between the room/game controller and the communication services
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • askForProductionOptions

        public abstract void askForProductionOptions(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object[]>> options)
        This method asks the user which production wants to activate. A production option is an array of two Assets objects: the first is the cost, the second is the result.
        Parameters:
        options - production options the player can choose from.

      • askLeaderDraft

        public abstract void askLeaderDraft(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> leaderOptions)
        This method notifies the user that can perform a leader draft, giving him an array of integers where are saved the leader's ids. Player will answer with the id of the leader he chose.
        Parameters:
        leaderOptions - the list of leaders to choose from

      • askFmToBoost

        public abstract void askFmToBoost()
        This method is called when the user activates the leader card "Federico da Montefeltro". The game asks the user what family member he wants to activate.

      • chooseLeaderToCopy

        public abstract void chooseLeaderToCopy(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> copyableLeaders)
        This method is called when a player activates the leader Lorenzo de Medici.

      • sendGameUpdate

        public abstract void sendGameUpdate(Board board,

        Calling this method the server will send the updated board and the list of the connected user to the client.
        Parameters:
        board - the game board
        players - arrayList of connected player
